MUSIC.START: To start, load music with the button or drag music here from your computer. You can change the language in settings. Remember you can check how everything works in help.

EFFCREATOR.TOREMOVE: To remove effects you must have at least 6 effects
EFFCREATOR.NAME: Name:

HELP.START: To start mixing music load a song. Click over any feature to highlight it.
HELP.PLAY: Play: You can play the song.
HELP.MDECKVOLUME: Main deck volume: Each deck as a main volume, change that to modify the volume of that deck.
HELP.MVOLUME: Master Volume: You can control which deck you want to hear, while lowering the volume of the other.
HELP.EQUALIZER: Equalizer: You can control the high, middle and low frecuencies of each deck sepparately. You can also reset it. It will reset automatically after loading a new song.
HELP.CUE: CUE: you can save any time in the song and the replay the song from that point. To save a point (up to 4) press the cue button. To replay from a point select what point you want. CUEs will reset after loading a new song.
HELP.PITCH: Pitch: Control the frecuency (and speed) of the song playing. Pitch will reset after loading a new song.
HELP.LOOPS: Loops: You can play in loop some parts of the song in units of beats.
HELP.EFFECTS: Effects: You can play effects over the song. To select what effect you want go to settings tab. You can create you own effects in the effects creator tab.

LAYOUT.INFO: For the application to work properly you must have a higher width than height in your device, thought at least width being 1.2 times the height is recommended.
